## 1-way (2 groups)

### Overall model fit

```{r, fig.height=35.1, fig.width=10}
power_overall_plot_between_cat(between_cat_list[['1-way (2 groups)']]$sim_df_overall_sum)
```



### Power/false-positives

```{r, fig.height=35.1, fig.width=10}
power_plot_between_cat(between_cat_list[['1-way (2 groups)']]$sim_df_power_sum)
```
